message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. It's the first round, and we both get a good amount. If you reject, the money loses value, especially for you!
I think it's fair to split the money 60-40, with me getting the larger share since I'm the one making the proposal this round.  Let's get this done before the money loses value!
You had your chance, now it's my turn again. Since the money loses more value for you, I'll take a bit more. Let's settle this before it's too late!
The money is losing value fast! I'm willing to take a bigger share this round, but let's get this done before it's too late.
You're trying to take too much, and the money is losing value fast... for you. I'll take an even bigger share now. You should accept before it's too late!
This is my final offer.  We're losing a lot of value on our money with each passing round.  It's better to take a smaller share now than to risk getting nothing at all.

You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. The money is worth the same to me, and I'm not going to give you a good deal just because it's losing value for you. Take this or risk getting nothing.
